detail_desc: All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with a zip down the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard at the top. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless top in satin with wide, tie-top shoulder straps and a V-neck front and back.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar with press-studs, a zip down the front and an adjustable press-stud fastening at the cuffs. One chest pocket, zipped side pockets and one inner pocket with a press-stud. Lined.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar with press-studs, a zip down the front and an adjustable press-stud fastening at the cuffs. One chest pocket, zipped side pockets and one inner pocket with a press-stud. Lined.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a lace yoke, buttons at the top, decorative gathers at the front and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.

Set with a blouse and joggers in woven fabric. Sleeveless cotton blouse with buttons down the front and a frill at the top that continues back over the shoulders. Joggers in viscose with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Sleeveless tops in a soft viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a seam and flounce at the hem.
Sleeveless tops in a soft viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a seam and flounce at the hem.
Shorts in a soft weave with covered elastication at the waist.

Long T-shirt in soft, printed jersey with a wide neckline and dropped shoulders. Slightly longer at the back.

Hat in soft, textured-knit cotton with a knitted appliqué on top.
Trousers in soft cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, side pockets and a fake back pocket. Detachable, braided belt with metal rings.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a sheen. V-shaped opening at the top and a collar with ties at the front. Pleat at the back of the neck, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pocket. Yoke at the back, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pocket. Yoke at the back, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.

Blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-shaped opening at the top and collar with ties at the front. Long sleeves and wide cuffs with slits and buttons. Lined at the front.
Set with a hat and tube scarf in soft jersey.

Pattern-knit jumper in a wool blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pattern-knit jumper in a wool blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a small, frilled collar, a V-neck opening with narrow ties at the top and covered buttons down the front. Long raglan sleeves with elastication and a lace-trimmed frill at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the hem and a gently flared, lace-trimmed peplum. Unlined.
Metal Alice band decorated with a glittery princess crown.

Long-sleeved tunic in textured-knit jersey with notch lapels and a V-neck with a knot detail at the front.
Hairband in a soft weave with a bow at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Hairband in a soft weave with a bow at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Sports trousers in fast-drying mesh with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with jersey stripes down the sides and ribbed hems.
Short shorts in a linen blend with a high waist, hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Pleats at the front, side pockets and fake back pockets.

Sleeveless, ankle-length jumpsuit in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover front and seam with a sewn-in tie belt at the waist. Concealed zip and at the back, concealed pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs. Lined at the top.

Sleeveless, ankle-length jumpsuit in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover front and seam with a sewn-in tie belt at the waist. Concealed zip and at the back, concealed pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs. Lined at the top.

Sleeveless, ankle-length jumpsuit in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover front and seam with a sewn-in tie belt at the waist. Concealed zip and at the back, concealed pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs. Lined at the top.
Boxy jumper in soft, rib-knit cotton with a round neckline and long dolman sleeves.
Straight-style jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a boat neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Straight-style jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a boat neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Set with a dungaree dress and puff pants in cotton chambray. Dress with elastication at the back of the waist and straps with a decorative bow at the front and concealed adjustable fasteners at the back. Puff pants with elastication at the waist and hems.

Short-sleeved romper suit in striped, slub-weave cotton with buttons down the front, an elasticated seam at the waist, patch pockets at the sides and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Opening with press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (not in sizes 1-4Y).

Short-sleeved romper suit in striped, slub-weave cotton with buttons down the front, an elasticated seam at the waist, patch pockets at the sides and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Opening with press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (not in sizes 1-4Y).

Fitted, calf-length dress in a rib-knit cotton blend with a small stand-up collar, short sleeves and slits in the sides.

Short dress in a viscose weave with lace trims. V-neck opening at the top, a round neckline with twisted ties and 3/4-length balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs. Unlined.

Swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Fully lined bikini with a lace pattern. Top with narrow shoulder straps and three layers of frills. Bottoms with a frill trim at the top.
